Name: Smoked Salty Sour
Ingredients: 30 ml Torabhaig Peated Single Malt Whisky
15 ml Green Chartreuse (or alternative herbal liqueur)
15 ml Demerara/Muscovado/brown sugar syrup (2 sugar to 1 water)
1 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters
15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Salty Islay peaty malt and Green Chartreuse influence this Scotch whisky sour.
History: Adapted from a drink created in 2014 by Dennis Wolf at Bar Raclette, Puerto Rico.
